mapper.select:
select count(*) from infrMember a
where 1=1

select count(*) from prjBookInfo a
where 1=1

select a.ifmmSeq , a.ifmmName , a.ifmmId , concat(substring(b.ifmpNumber,1,3),"-",substring(b.ifmpNumber,4,4),"-",substring(b.ifmpNumber,7,4)) as ifmpPhone ,(select ifcdName from infrcode where ifmmGenderCd=ifcdseq) as ifmmGender ,c.ifmeEmailFull ,a.ifmmPassword ,d.ifmaAddressFull ,e.ifnaName ,(select ifcdName from infrcode where ifmmGenderCd=ifcdseq) as ifmmGender ,concat(substring(a.ifmmDob,1,4),"년", substring(a.ifmmDob,5,3), "월" ,substring(a.ifmmDob,8,3),"일") as ifmmDob
,(select ifcdName from infrCode where ifcdSeq= i.ifjqQuestionCd) as ifjqQuestionName ,i.ifjqAnswer ,a.ifmmSmsConsentNy ,a.ifmmEmailConsentNy ,a.ifmmPushConsentNy
from infrMember a
left join infrmemberphone b on b.ifmmseq=a.ifmmseq and b.ifmpDefaultNy = 1 left join infrmemberEmail c on c.ifmmseq=a.ifmmseq and c.ifmeDefaultNy = 1 left join infrmemberAddress d on d.ifmmseq=a.ifmmseq and d.ifmaDefaultNy = 1
left join infrmembernationalty f on f.ifmmseq=a.ifmmseq and ifmnDefaultNy=1 left join infrnationalty e on e.ifnaseq=f.ifnaseq left join infrmemberaddressonline h on h.ifmmseq = a.ifmmseq and h.ifaoDefaultNy=1 left join infrmemberjoinqna i on i.ifmmseq=a.ifmmseq where a.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}

select a.prjSeq , a.prjTitle ,b.pjbcName ,(select pjbcName from prjBookCategory where a.prjBookCategoryCd = pjbcSeq ) as bookCategory
,a.prjPublisher ,a.prjPrice
from prjBookInfo a left join prjBookCreater b on b.prjSeq=a.prjSeq and b.pjbcDefaultNy = 1
where 1=1 and prjDelNy=0
AND a.prjDelNy = 1 AND a.prjDelNy = 0
and a.prjTitle LIKE concat('%', #{shValue} ,'%') and b.pjbcName LIKE concat('%', #{shValue} ,'%') and a.prjPublisher LIKE concat('%', #{shValue} ,'%')
limit #{startRnumForMysql},#{rowNumToShow}
